description: Open Wiki page; Perform search; Open article from search result; Get article title; Rotate app to lanscape; Check article title hasn't changed; Rotate app to portrait; Check article title hasn't changed;

steps.name: Rotate screen to portrait mode. This method doesn't work for mobile web.
Skips welcome page in mobile app. This method doesn't work for mobile web.
Opens start page for mobile web. This method doesn't work for mobile app.
Typing and sending the search query in the search field
Clicking on the article, defined by its description, on the search result page
